name: Grandpa's Big Day In!
description:
Use: SPACE and ARROW KEYS

HINT: You have to push Grandpa to the computer room.

Have you ever had to teach your grandpa how to use a computer? This game simulates the entire experience! With features like; destructible environments, retro in-game working keyboard and desktop simulation, you're guaranteed to have a hilarious experience!

This game was made in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2015!

http://www.twitter.com/nate_and_howard
